articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Singapore nurses allowed to wear own tudung if within guidelines - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Muslim nurses, allowed to wear the tudung to work from Monday (Nov 1), may use their own headscarves if they follow guidelines set by their organisations, said hospitals.

articles.title: Halloween: veja fantasias dos famosos em festas do Dia das Bruxas deste ano - G1
articles.description: Ariana Grande, Lil Nas X, Hailey Bieber, Mick Jagger e Anitta entraram no clima do Halloween. Veja FOTOS.
articles.content: O Halloween é uma data que os famosos esperam ansiosos todos os anos (e os fãs também). Existe todo um frisson para saber qual vai ser a fantasia do ídolo e quem vai surpreender mais. Mas, longe de s… [+608 chars]

articles.title: Singapore's Kevin Wong wows with 'hawker' inspired duck at S. Pellegrino Young Chef awards - CNA
articles.description: The 27-year-old head chef of Meta placed among the top three at the global finale competition in Milan after showcasing how he incorporated Southeast Asian flavours, techniques and materials into his dish.

articles.title: Singapore abandons the 'zero COVID' strategy - NPR
articles.description: Singapore is the latest country in Asia to try to live with the coronavirus.
articles.content:
Singapore is the latest country in Asia to try to live with the coronavirus.MICHEL MARTIN, HOST:

articles.title: Natural Resources on Mars Could Produce Rocket Fuel, Say Researchers - IGN SOUTH EAST ASIA
articles.description: Cyanobacteria and E. coli could be the key to Martian rocket fuel.
articles.content:
A new study has discovered that future astronauts who find themselves on Mars may be able to use its natural resources to help make rocket fuel that could assist in getting them back to Earth.

articles.title: Schools issue warnings over children copying Netflix's Squid Game - AsiaOne
articles.description: Schools around the world are worried that children may watch Netflix smash hit Squid Game and mimic scenes from the popular but violent Korean drama series.
